Title: IS_IPV4_MAPPED
Description: Returns 1 if a given a numeric binary string IPv6 address, such as returned by INET6_ATON(), is a valid IPv4-mapped address, otherwise returns 0.

MariaDB starting with 10.5.0From MariaDB 10.5.0, when the argument is not INET6, automatic implicit CAST to INET6 is applied. As a consequence, IS_IPV4_MAPPED now understands arguments in both text representation and binary(16) representation. Before MariaDB 10.5.0, the function understood only binary(16) representation.
